text: Ara allah yadi kono aghata diye amake pirana karena tahale tini chara e mocanakari ara ke'u ne'i, ara tini yadi tomake cana bhala karate tahale tamra pracurya rada habara naya. Tini ta anayana karena tamra dasadera madhyera yara prati iccha karena. Ara tini'i to paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
